pages.text: The results of combining $(l:resources/azurite)Azurite$(/l) and the protective properties of $(l:general/pigment#blue)Blue Pigment$(/l) really sparked your interest. The material seemed to surround itself with a transparent aura which took some effort to penetrate when you reached for the lump.\\_This is going to be interesting..._

pages.title: Azure Dike
pages.text: A magical aura surrounding your body, shielding you from incoming damage.\Slowly, but steadily recharges up to a specific amount.\\Each piece of Azure Dike Equipment increases the maximum amount of protection.

pages.title: Azure Dike Ring
pages.text: - Grants you [#](495b24)4[#]() points of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()\- Slightly speeds up [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() charging

pages.title: Azure Dike Belt
pages.text: - Grants you [#](495b24)6[#]() points of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()\- Increases [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() recovery after a hit, making it recharge quicker

pages.title: Shieldgrasp Amulet
pages.text: Infuse it with $(l:magic/ink)Blue Ink$(/l) in a $(l:magic/color_picker)Color Picker$() to increase the amount of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() provided.\Cheap at first, the required energy to infuse more power into this amulet increases exponentially.
